channel.title: Rides on Acanthiza
channel.description: Recent content in Rides on Acanthiza

item.title: My ride data
item.description: Data from my rides have been scattered in several places. Through the years I moved from MS Excel to MS Access to Ascent to Strava to store ride data. # more Recently the following have provided the potential to make combining these data easy: workflow, particularly with tidyverse rmarkdown apps to rip data out of MS Access databases from a mac mdb accdb Viewer the export .csv button on most pages on Veloviewer This is the piecing together and exploration of those data.
